sknet.network¶

Table of Contents

  • sknet.network
class sknet.network.Network(layers=None, name='model', dataset=None, **kwargs)[source]¶
__init__(layers=None, name='model', dataset=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

__weakref__[source]¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

get_input_for(var, indices, context)[source]¶

given a placeholder, batch indices and a set_name (context) return the data corresponding to be fed for this placeholder extract from the given set and indices

Parameters:
var : tf.placeholder

a placeholder, present in self.placeholders and that has been linked with a corresponding dataset in self.linkage

indices : list or array of int

the indices of the data to be extracted

context : the set to extract the data from
get_layers()[source]¶

To implement model specific list of layers that has to be passed to the network
